# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those seeking high-quality solutions in its category. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I estimate its worth to be well above $150. Considering its unique advantages and market positioning, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for an introductory price of $200. This is an excellent chance to secure a top-tier product at a special rate. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
